org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport, IPhpConfigurationMojo, IPhpWalkConfigurationMojo
public class PhpDocumentor
extends AbstractApiDocReport

A maven 2.0 plugin for generating phpdocumentor documentations. This plugin is used in the site phase.

Author:
Christian Wiedemann, Tobias Sarnowski
